00015 class StringMatcher
00016 {
00017 public:
00018     StringMatcher(const std::string &s);
00019     bool matches(const std::string &s) const;
00020     bool operator==(const std::string &s) const { return matches(s); }
00021

00023     std::string literal;
00024     boost::regex re;
00025 };

00027 struct OptionBase
00028 {
00029     std::string pattern;
00030 
00031     bool entirely_replaced;
00032     std::string replace_text;
00033 
00034     std::string header_text;
00035     std::string footer_text;
00036 
00037     std::vector<std::string> attributes;
00038 
00039     OptionBase(): entirely_replaced(false) {}
00040 };
00041 
00042 struct LibraryOptions: OptionBase
00043 {
00044     std::set<std::string> win32_debug_dependencies;
00045     std::set<std::string> win32_release_dependencies;
00046     std::set<std::string> unix_dependencies;
00047 };
00048 
00049 struct FileOptions: OptionBase
00050 {
00051     std::set<std::string> templ_instances;
00052 };
00053

00055 {
00056 };
00057 
00058 struct ConstructorOptions: OptionBase
00059 {
00060 };

00064     std::string get_method;
00065     std::string set_method;
00066     std::string count_method;

00072 struct ReflectorOptions: OptionBase
00073 {
00074     enum TypeKind
00075     {
00076         DEFAULT_TYPE,
00077         OBJECT_TYPE,
00078         ABSTRACT_OBJECT_TYPE,
00079         ENUM_TYPE,
00080         VALUE_TYPE,
00081         STD_VALUE,
00082         STD_MAP,
00083         STD_VECTOR,
00084         STD_SET,
00085         STD_LIST,
00086         STD_PAIR
00087     };
00088 
00089     TypeKind type_kind;
00090 
00091     std::string comparator;
00092     bool comparator_specified;
00093 
00094     std::string readerwriter;
00095     bool readerwriter_specified;
00096 
00097     typedef std::vector<std::pair<StringMatcher, ConstructorOptions> > ConstructorOptionList;
00098     ConstructorOptionList constructor_opts;
00099 
00100     typedef std::vector<std::pair<StringMatcher, MethodOptions> > MethodOptionList;
00101     MethodOptionList method_opts;
00102 
00103     typedef std::vector<std::pair<StringMatcher, PropertyOptions> > PropertyOptionList;
00104     PropertyOptionList property_opts;
00105 
00106     std::set<std::string> added_text;
00107     std::set<std::string> suppressed_text;
00108 
00109     std::set<std::string> added_base_types;
00110 
00111     ReflectorOptions()
00112     :    type_kind(DEFAULT_TYPE),
00113         comparator_specified(false),
00114         readerwriter_specified(false)
00115     {
00116     }
00117 };

00206     {
00207         return cstack_.top();

00216 // INLINE METHODS

00218 inline const std::string &Configuration::getRelativePathDelimiter() const
00219 {
00220     return path_delim_;
00221 }
00222 
00223 inline void Configuration::setRelativePathDelimiter(const std::string &s)
00224 {
00225     path_delim_ = PathNameUtils::consolidateDelimiters(s, false);
00226 }
00227 
00228 inline const LibraryOptions *Configuration::getLibraryOptions(const std::string &s) const
00229 {
00230     for (LibraryOptionList::const_iterator i=lib_opts_.begin(); i!=lib_opts_.end(); ++i)
00231         if (i->first.matches(s)) return &i->second;
00232     return 0;
00233 }
00234 
00235 inline const FileOptions *Configuration::getFileOptions(const std::string &s) const
00236 {
00237     for (FileOptionList::const_iterator i=file_opts_.begin(); i!=file_opts_.end(); ++i)
00238         if (i->first.matches(s)) return &i->second;
00239     return 0;
00240 }
00241 
00242 inline const ReflectorOptions *Configuration::getReflectorOptions(const std::string &s) const
00243 {
00244     for (ReflectorOptionList::const_iterator i=ref_opts_.begin(); i!=ref_opts_.end(); ++i)
00245         if (i->first.matches(s)) return &i->second;
00246     return 0;
00247 }
00248 
00249 inline const PropertyOptions *Configuration::getPropertyOptions(const std::string &t, const std::string &s) const
00250 {
00251     for (ReflectorOptionList::const_iterator i=ref_opts_.begin(); i!=ref_opts_.end(); ++i)
00252     {
00253         if (i->first.matches(t)) 
00254         {
00255             for (ReflectorOptions::PropertyOptionList::const_iterator j=i->second.property_opts.begin(); j!=i->second.property_opts.end(); ++j)
00256             {
00257                 if (j->first.matches(s))
00258                     return &j->second;
00259             }
00260         }
00261     }
00262     return 0;
00263 }
